entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is introduced as the barman who is impassive and turns away from Harry without confirming or denying his identity.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who recognizes Aberforth's back and addresses him.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the owner of a mirror that Harry broke nearly two years before.

entities.name: dung
entities.description: Dung is introduced as someone from whom Aberforth bought Sirius's mirror.

relationships.description: Aberforth bought Sirius's mirror from Dung.
Aberforth bought the mirror from Dung.
